original_text: The Receiving Party shall strictly maintain the confidentiality of the Proprietary Information. Proprietary Information may be shared only with Receiving Party's employees who need to know such information for the purpose of performing obligations under this Agreement and who are bound by written confidentiality obligations at least as restrictive as those herein. The Receiving Party shall not reverse engineer, disassemble, or decompile any prototypes, software, or other tangible objects which embody the Proprietary Information.
gold_simplification: The Receiving Party shall strictly maintain the confidentiality of the Proprietary Information. Proprietary Information may be shared only with Receiving Party's employees who need to know such information for the purpose of performing obligations under this Agreement and who are bound by written confidentiality obligations at least as restrictive as those herein. The Receiving Party shall not reverse engineer, disassemble, or decompile any prototypes, software, or other tangible objects which embody the Proprietary Information.
key_facts: Receiving Party must maintain strict confidentiality
Can only share with need-to-know employees under confidentiality obligations
Prohibited from reverse engineering software or prototypes
